trans-unit.source: Describes the placement of where a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control appears on the screen.
Use the members of this enumeration class to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> property value, together with the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A>properties, determines where and how a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> appears on the screen.
For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).

A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control relative to the upper-left corner of the screen and at an offset that is defined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset"></xref> property values.
If the screen edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control then repositions itself to align with the edge.

A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control relative to the upper-left corner of the screen and at an offset that is defined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset"></xref> property values.

If the screen edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control extends in the opposite direction from the axis defined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset"></xref>=.

A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control where the control aligns its upper edge with the lower edge of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref> and aligns its left edge with the left edge of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref>.

If the lower screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself so that its lower edge aligns with the upper edge of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref>.
If the upper screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control then repositions itself so that its upper edge aligns with the upper screen-edge.
A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control where it is centered over the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref>.
If a screen edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself to align with the screen edge.

A position and repositioning behavior for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control that is defined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback"></xref> delegate specified by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CustomPopupPlacementCallback"></xref> property.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control that aligns its right edge with the left edge of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref> and aligns its upper edge with the upper edge of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref>.

If the left screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> repositions itself so that its left edge aligns with the right edge of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref>.
If the right screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the right edge of the control aligns with the right screen-edge.
If the upper or lower screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself to align with the obscuring screen edge.

A postion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control that aligns its upper edge with the lower edge of the bounding box of the mouse and aligns its left edge with the left edge of the bounding box of the mouse.
If the lower screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, it repositions itself to align with the upper edge of the bounding box of the mouse.
If the upper screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself to align with the upper screen-edge.

A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control relative to the tip of the mouse cursor and at an offset that is defined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset"></xref> property values.
If a horizontal or vertical screen edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, it opens in the opposite direction from the obscuring edge.
If the opposite screen edge also obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, it then aligns with the obscuring screen edge.

A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref> and at an offset that is defined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset"></xref> property values.
If the screen edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself to align with the screen edge.

A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref> and at an offset that is defined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset"></xref> property values.

If a screen edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> extends in the opposite direction from the direction from the axis defined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset"></xref>.
If the opposite screen edge also obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control then aligns with this screen edge.

A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control that aligns its left edge with the right edge of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref> and aligns its upper edge with the upper edge of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref>.

If the right screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself so that its left edge aligns with the left edge of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref>.
If the left screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself so that its left edge aligns with the left screen-edge.
If the upper or lower screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control then repositions itself to align with the obscuring screen edge.

A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control that aligns its lower edge with the upper edge of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref> and aligns its left edge with the left edge of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref>.

If the upper screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself so that its upper edge aligns with the lower edge of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref>.
If the lower screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the lower edge of the control aligns with the lower screen-edge.
If the left or right screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, it then repositions itself to align with the obscuring screen.
